EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Miss These JetWave Savings Ending Dec. 31!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
See How You Can Save on JetWave™
Honeywell’s JetWave, powered by Inmarsat’s fast and reliable Jet ConneX service, is the premier connectivity solution. Designed to give you the ultimate inflight entertainment experience and with reduced pricing, there is no better time to add JetWave to your aircraft!
Now through December 31st, you can take advantage of reduced pricing on the Honeywell JetWave Tail Mount Antenna, plus write-off up to 100% of business aircraft equipment purchases (including JetWave) thanks to a 2018 tax code change still in effect.
Treat yourself to more reliable inflight Wi-Fi! Schedule your upgrade with Pentastar Aviation today. Click below to request a quote.
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/upgrade-your-in-flight-wi-fi-experience-with-jetwave?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_pentastar_jw]]>
